parameter.help:
Press ESC or the x button to close the settings. Use the "Clear INI settings" toolbar button to reset to default values.
Don't forget to Click to save settings when you are done!

Here you can select paths that will be searched for Applications and Simulations (see the respective help file pages). In addition to the paths you set here, INIshell will decide on a number of standard paths to walk (you can view a list via the command line options).

parameter.label: Add path to search for Applications and Simulations:
parameter.help: Enter path to search for Applications and Simulations
After saving the settings you must right-click the Applications or Simulations view and click "Refresh" (or check the "View" menu for the keyboard shortcut).

parameter.label: Program language:
parameter.help: Note that this only concerns the static part of INIshell and the applications' descriptions are up to the software's vendor to translate.

parameter.caption: Remember window sizes
parameter.help: Restore window sizes when they are re-opened.

parameter.label: Font size:
parameter.help: Font size for the main INIshell text elements. Takes effect on next program restart.

parameter.caption: Set monospaced font in the Preview window
parameter.help: This is useful to keep the formatting of space-indented INI files.

parameter.label: Dark theme:
parameter.help: Choose how to decide if a dark theme should be enabled for INIshell. A program restart is required for this to take effect.

parameter.caption: Warn on unsaved INI changes
parameter.help: When closing an opened INI file, ask what to do with unsaved changes? If set to false, unsaved changes will be discarded. This also sets the behavior for unsaved changes in the preview window.

parameter.label: Whitespace handling:

o.caption: Leave whitespaces in INI as they are
Use single space in INI files

parameter.help: Use single spaces for writing out INI keys or remember whitespaces from the input INI? Takes effect when the next INI file is read.
